hero_text: At GMG, we support international talents in pursuing enriching learning and work experiences in Germany and beyond.

recruitment.title: Healthcare Recruitment
recruitment.description: An international career in the healthcare sector awaits you. We connect healthcare professionals with unparalleled opportunities in Germany and Saudi Arabia.

details.title: Tailored Job Placement
details.description: Collaboration with renowned hospitals, clinics, and healthcare institutions to ensure opportunities suited to your specialization and skills.

details.title: Comprehensive Administrative Support
details.description: Management of visa procedures and professional recognition (degree equivalency). Preparation of required documents for a smooth and stress-free transition.

details.title: Cultural and Professional Integration
details.description: German or English language courses (depending on the destination) to ensure your success in a multicultural environment. Integration workshops: Familiarization with local cultural and professional practices.

why_choose_us: Expertise in international recruitment, especially in the healthcare sector.
Extensive network of partners in Germany and Saudi Arabia.
Comprehensive support from registration to placement and successful integration.

students_placement.title: Student Placement
students_placement.description: Study at internationally renowned universities. We help you enroll in the best universities in Germany, Italy, and France.

details.title: Personalized Academic Guidance
details.description: Analysis of your academic profile, goals, and area of interest. Advice on choosing universities and programs that align with your ambitions.

details.title: Support Throughout the Admission Process
details.description: Document preparation: Translation, certification, and compliance with academic requirements. Assistance with completing forms and meeting university-specific requirements.

details.title: Post-Admission Services
details.description: Management of student visas, assistance with finding accommodation, obtaining insurance, and language courses for smooth academic and social integration.

why_choose_us: Recognized expertise: Years of experience in supporting international students.
Extensive university network: Partnerships with prestigious institutions in Germany, Italy, and France.
Comprehensive support: A turnkey service from application to settlement.

professional_training.title: Professional Training
professional_training.description: Join world-class training programs in Germany in high-demand sectors such as healthcare, engineering, and technology.

details.title: Orientation and Training Selection
details.description: Assessment of your profile and skills. Selection of training programs tailored to your professional goals and passions.

details.title: Administrative Support
details.description: Document preparation: Translation, legalization, and certification. Submission to professional schools and partner companies. Visa management: Full support for obtaining a training visa.

details.title: Complementary Services for a Smooth Transition
details.description: Language courses: German training to reach the required level (B1 or B2). Cultural preparation: Workshops to understand the German education and work system.

why_choose_us: Access to unique opportunities: Collaboration with leading companies in various sectors.
Tailored support: Personalized follow-up to maximize your success.
Guaranteed professional integration: Most participants find employment in Germany after their training.

language_school.title: Language School
language_school.description: Learn and access new opportunities through our language school. We offer German, English, Italian, and Spanish courses for all levels.

details.title: German Language Courses
details.description: Levels offered: A1 to B2. Options available: Intensive courses for fast results or extensive courses adapted to your schedule. Preparation for Goethe, Telc, Ã–SD, and ECL exams.

details.title: English Language Courses
details.description: Levels offered: From beginner to advanced. Objectives: Preparation for TOEFL, IELTS, or Cambridge tests. Development of skills for professional or academic communication.

details.title: Italian and Spanish Language Courses
details.description: Courses for basic or advanced communication, suited for studies, travel, or work. Familiarization with Italian and Spanish cultures.

why_choose_us: Modern teaching methods: Interactive and immersive approaches for fast and effective learning.
Qualified teachers: Our instructors are experienced and specialized in language teaching.
Flexibility: Options for in-person or online courses, according to your preferences.

features-home.description: GMG guides you every step of the way, ensuring fast, reliable, and personalized service.

data.desc: Thanks to GMG, I was able to pursue my studies at a prestigious university in Germany. Their support was exceptional.
data.name: Hiba Ben Youssef
data.title: Student, Berlin

data.desc: The recruitment process with GMG was smooth and effective. I now work as a nurse in a hospital in Germany.
data.name: Ahmed Khemiri
data.title: Nurse, Frankfurt

data.desc: GMG has been a reliable partner in my transition to an international career. Their constant support made all the difference.
data.name: Noura Rahmani
data.title: Physiotherapist, Munich

question_one.title: How can I apply for a job in the healthcare sector?
question_one.description: We help you prepare your documents, apply, and manage administrative procedures, including visas. Contact us to get started.

question_two.title: How do I enroll in a university in Germany?
question_two.description: We guide you in researching universities, submitting applications, and following up until admission. Our advisors are here to assist you.

question_three.title: What are the requirements for professional training in Germany?
question_three.description: You generally need a recognized diploma and a B1 or B2 level in German. We offer language courses to help you meet these requirements.

question_four.title: Do you offer German language courses?
question_four.description: Yes, we offer courses for all levels, tailored to the needs of students and professionals.

question_five.title: How can I get help with my application?
question_five.description: Our team is available to answer your questions. Contact us by email or through our online form.

features.title: Achieve Your Educational and Career Dreams
features.sm_desc_1: At GMG, we open doors to international opportunities for students and professionals.
features.sm_desc_2: Our services simplify the process, allowing you to focus on your success.
features.project_desc: A clear strategy to achieve your goals.
features.ideation_desc: Transforming your ideas into tangible results.
features.design_desc: Support adapted to your specific needs.

about.title: About GMG
about.right_text_1: GMG is dedicated to connecting international talents with educational and career opportunities. Our goal is to make transitions simple and accessible.
about.right_text_2: We provide personalized support at every step, ensuring a successful and sustainable integration.
about.desc: With GMG, I was able to successfully transition to Germany. Their team handled every step, making the experience stress-free.

tunisia_office.heading: GMG Tunisia Office
tunisia_office.description: Our office in Tunis is your starting point for an international career or education.
tunisia_office.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

international_offices.heading: International Offices
international_offices.description: With offices in Germany, Saudi Arabia, and Colombia, we provide global support to achieve your goals.

colombia.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM

germany.card_hours: Open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

saudi_arabia.card_hours: Open Sunday to Thursday, 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
